:py:mod:`pyslam.image_processing.feature_descriptors`
=====================================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.image_processing.feature_descriptors

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Contains types and logic to work with image features,
   such as ORB features. By "features" we are referring
   to corner-like regions of interest, with "descriptors" generally
   referring to some form of image patch descriptor.



Subpackages
-----------
.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :maxdepth: 3

   descriptors/index.rst
   extractors/index.rst

   :maxdepth: 1

   ImagePairFeatureMatches/index.rst
   Keypoint/index.rst
